title: Moderate: dnsmasq security and bug fix update
description:
The dnsmasq packages contain Dnsmasq, a lightweight DNS (Domain Name Server) forwarder and DHCP (Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol) server.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
Additional Changes:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.7 Release Notes linked from the References section.

references.title: Update information for CVE-2022-0934 is retrieved from Red Hat
